ComicInfo.Penciller: David Williams,Erik Larsen,Adam Hughes,Erik Larsen,David Williams
ComicInfo.Summary: Dragon defeats DoubleHeader. The Annihilators plot the fall of the Vicious Circle. Mrs. Harris is enraged with Dragon. Emily Schwartzblatt claims Dragon is her son Rodney. Lt. Darling confesses to Dragon, who advises him to run. Freak Force attack the Annihilators. Mighty Man defeats Brawn.

ComicInfo.Title: Freak Force Fights; Battle With Brawn
